titleStmt.title: Deed Connected with a Sale of Houses

revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: (Lines 2–9) . . . father . . . Stephanos, son of Leontios, . . . above-mentioned most blessed Stephanos . . . . . you will read out that he has sold to you [the house . . . ] through a previous seizure by him . . . his [outbuilding?] and my house situated to the north, all belonging to this Kastron (of Sadaqa), fully . . . one half . . . and a . . . part of the . . . and the whole outbuilding [and] one half of another outbuilding, three ﬁrst-ﬂoor rooms in the[house of the] most blessed Stephanos. . . . come to their senses (?) and to the recognition of the rights in the refuse pit, and after this . . . and I order you to take this from him. Witnessing that it had come to Theo[doros? . . . ] to have sold to me for the . . . which the most blessed Georgios had agreed with me . . . (Lines 13–16) . . . . that lawfully would be given . . . by a contract of sale, part of the house which your father sold to me. These two rooms of Stephanos (through?) the proofs . . . of my . . . and one half of the outbuilding in front (of it) and one third of the same refuse pit, and in it . . . sending to me. Equally he witnessed to me that, having my response in the matter [and the] written . . . from me . . . he has . . .
